mapper.update: update sys_log set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, remote_addr = #{remoteAddr,jdbcType=INTEGER}, request_class = #{requestClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, request_method = #{requestMethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, args = #{args,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, user_id, remote_addr, request_class, request_method, args from sys_log
